description: This file provides utility functions for handling pagination in a Flask web application, including extracting pagination parameters from query strings and constructing pagination metadata.

methods.name: get_pagination_params(default_page: int = 1, default_page_size: int = 12, max_page_size: int = 100)
methods.description: Extracts 'page' and 'page_size' parameters from the query string, with default values and validation.

methods.name: dict build_pagination_metadata(total: int, page: int, page_size: int)
methods.description: Constructs a dictionary containing pagination metadata such as total pages, current page, and navigation links.

ctags.name: build_pagination_metadata
ctags.pattern: /^def build_pagination_metadata(total: int, page: int, page_size: int) -> dict:$/

ctags.name: get_pagination_params
ctags.pattern: /^def get_pagination_params(default_page: int = 1, default_page_size: int = 12, max_page_size: int/
